subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Frank'sBoxes/Voices/Those--Teams-NeededChris-.mp3 
  Uploaded by : purplespacefriend <franks-boxes@...> 
  Description : From the RS '470 on 12/5/07, AM " Those Teams Needed Chris (to) Spread Their Fucking Word--It fucked Him Up---" followed by something about an instrument. Whose source is negative , and whose is positive is just a matter of persp[ective--I guess. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Frank%27sBoxes/Voices/Those--Teams-NeededChris-.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

purplespacefriend <franks-boxes@...>
